oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MTT Agrifood Research Finland / Environmental Research / Ecological Production
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of the research is ecologically and economically sustainable food production and a living countryside. The research on organic production is focused on nutrient economy and production techniques.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Organization} MTT Agrifood Research Finland / Environmental Research / Ecological Production.
